channel.title: hugo on Abyss
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Abyss

item.title: So It Begins
item.description: Finally, I have published a website on my domains. I’ve always had thoughts of what I’d do with a website, but also realized that no one is interested enough in my thoughts to come to a website to read them. Then I would realize that I would have to pay a hosting fee and deal with a lot of HTML/CSS to design it properly (and boy am I picky). That was always enough to convince me not to do it.
